articles.title: Want The Pixel 10’s Entire 12GB RAM To Yourself? Here Is An Easy Fix, If You Do Not Mind Slower AI Operations - Wccftech
articles.description: Google decided to allocate some of the Pixel 10’s 12GB RAM to be used for AI tasks, but there is a simple way on how you can utilize all of that memory, assuming you do not mind a trade-off for slower artificial intelligence tasks
articles.content: Googles RAM count for the Pixel 9 and Pixel 10 did not change, but to claim its supremacy in the AI race and for its relevant features to open up faster, the company decided to allocate 3GB of RAM to… [+2099 chars]
